x-prompt.message: What library type you are looking for?

domainName.description: The domain name of the library.

directory.description: A directory where the library is placed inside the domain directory.

withoutLibraryTypePrefix.description: Create the library inside library type directory `<domainName>/<libraryType>-<libraryName>` to `<domainName>/<libraryType>/<libraryName>`.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files, or 'none' to skip generating the style file.

flat.description: Create new files at the top level of the current project.

standaloneConfig.description: Split the project configuration into `<projectRoot>/project.json` rather than including it inside `workspace.json`.
